update_text:
📝 Take Note: Saysomething is in 'Open Beta Testing' phase, it means the website is made available for everyone interested. This interested group will use the website. share the reviews to the publisher. This process is also called as pre-release of the website.

- 👉 You can now send voice message to the user.
- 👉 Delete Voice Messages & Normal Messages.
- 👉 Bug fixes.
